provisions of this chapter: section 120.00 (assault in the third

(gang assault in the second degree); section 120.07 (gang assault in the

the term "age" means sixty years old or more;\n
the term "disability" means a physical or mental impairment that\nsubstantially limits a major life activity;\n

the term "gender identity or expression" means a person's actual
or perceived gender-related identity, appearance, behavior, expression,
or other gender-related characteristic regardless of the sex assigned to
that person at birth, including, but not limited to, the status of being
transgender.
